ygData.msgSnippet: Great to see u guys r so high on RPG, UO and  Eq . BTW my nick in EQ is Yiyang without the n , goin on lvl 4 now. I was on UOL in the early days when the
ygData.messageBody:
Great to see u guys r so "high" on RPG, UO and Eq .
BTW my nick in EQ is Yiyang without the "n", goin on lvl 4 now.

I was on UOL in the early days when the trail was on,the mega lag was on too
:P, after the beta , i gave up on UO and spend lotsa time on Subspace (not a
RPG game).

I might be able to help on purchasing EQ for around US$59.00 , thats around
S$100, including shipping. only a few copies with money up front. let me
know if some of u ppl r keen. I'll like to see more Singaporean playin this
game.



Rdgs
Alex
